extendedInfo.description: This is a MMORPG in the style of Storm8 or Moblyng games.  Your goal is to work with (and against) the political parties in St. Louis to become mayor!Features:* Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game* Named clans, political parties, and elections help you advance your player and your clan* Debates and covert actions help you gain advantage over your rivals* Complete missions throughout the city of St. Louis to increase your influence* Purchase businesses and equipment and hire employees and agents to further your goals* and more!

reviews.title: Addicting, Competitive, & Fun Political Game
reviews.comment: The best social game in the market. Join doctors for ur party of choice. We have a training clan to teach u the ends and outs to be successful. ** Join clan TCO ***Docs are a awesome party and play as one. We help each other and will be more than willing to help u.. Start today and ask for Maggie. Tell her Tish sent ya. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Luv it! Best game ever!!!!!
reviews.comment: I DELETED MY STORM8 GAMES FOR THIS!!! Code m0aa7 clan tk0  party. Ea. If u want a real challange with plenty of help and bonus join me!!! :-) :-) :-) :-)  my fair lady
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks!
reviews.comment: Latest thing they did was add a password to get into your account. Now i can barely read my messages before it will force me to enter the password again! I have not been able to play the game at all for probably three months because of this problem. Because of this I was booted out of my clan and have not been able to return. This game used to be fun, but until they add a \"remember me\" function or regulate how often you have to log in, it will suck like it does now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uprising St Louis
reviews.comment: It is a highly addictive game that provide hours of good fun. You also meet people from all over the world .Join the right party namely WORKERS. They have a clan TC1. TC1 help new players to learn the game. Ask for Maggie, George, Grasshopper, Prime, Stink or Hoof. They are always willing to help players. Happy Gaming! SuriG
